overfit.note: HMM + deterministic z-scores. No neural network train/val loss ratio applicable.

no_zero_var.detail: etf_regime_prob std=0.384, etf_capital_intensity std=1.114, etf_pv_divergence std=0.994. All well above 1e-10.

hpo_coverage.note: Optuna ran with best_value=0.0858. Training completed successfully.

mi.detail: MI increase 1.58% (threshold > 5%). Individual MI: etf_regime_prob=0.0003, etf_capital_intensity=0.0014, etf_pv_divergence=0.0000.

vif.detail: etf_regime_prob VIF=12.47 (EXCEEDS 10 threshold), etf_capital_intensity VIF=6.25, etf_pv_divergence VIF=1.06. Base features have inf VIF (pre-existing multicollinearity).

stability.detail: etf_regime_prob std=0.1614, etf_capital_intensity std=0.1617, etf_pv_divergence std=0.1268. Two columns marginally above 0.15 threshold.

gate2.failure_reason: All three Gate 2 checks fail. MI increase only 1.58% (need >5%). etf_regime_prob VIF=12.47 exceeds 10 threshold. Stability marginally fails for regime_prob and capital_intensity. However, consistent with VIX/Technical/Cross-Asset/Yield-Curve precedent where Gate 2 failures did not predict Gate 3 failure.

gate3.note: Gate 3 PASS on both Sharpe (+0.377, 7.5x threshold) and MAE (-0.0436, 4.4x threshold). Sharpe improvement is the strongest among all submodels (+0.377 vs VIX +0.289). MAE improved in 4/5 folds. etf_regime_prob ranked #9/33 in feature importance (3.52%), etf_pv_divergence ranked #19/33 (2.75%), etf_capital_intensity ranked #22/33 (2.55%).

decision_rationale: Gate 1 PASS (no constant/NaN columns, all autocorrelations well below 0.99). Gate 2 FAIL (MI +1.58%, VIF 12.47 for regime_prob, stability marginally fails) -- consistent with precedent where MI underestimates nonlinear contributions. Gate 3 PASS via both Sharpe (+0.377, 7.5x threshold, 3/5 folds) and MAE (-0.0436, 4.4x threshold, 4/5 folds). The etf_flow submodel provides the strongest Sharpe improvement of any submodel, indicating that volume-based regime detection and PV divergence genuinely improve risk-adjusted returns. etf_regime_prob VIF=12.47 exceeds 10 threshold but this is acceptable given Gate 3 confirmation and the feature's rank #9 importance.
vif_warning: etf_regime_prob VIF=12.47 exceeds 10 threshold. Monitor in meta-model for potential regularization needs.
